Package com.defano.jmonet.algo.transform.image

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ApplyAffineTransform
    Applies an AffineTransform to a given image.
    ApplyPixelTransform
    Applies a PixelTransform to every pixel of a given image that's contained within a masking shape.
    ColorReductionTransform
    Converts the color space of an image to a reduced palette containing no more than a specified number of colors.
    FillTransform
    Fills every transparent pixel of an image that lies within a given mask with a specified paint or texture.
    FloodFillTransform
    Performs a "flood fill" (sometimes called "seed fill" or "spill paint") of the image with a provided paint or texture.
    GreyscaleReductionTransform
    Transform an image to a gray-scale containing no more than the specified number of gray shades.
    ProjectionTransform
    Performs a projection of the source image onto an arbitrary quadrilateral.
    RubbersheetTransform
    Performs a rubber-sheet projection of the source image onto an arbitrary quadrilateral.
    ScaleTransform
    Transforms an image by scaling it to a specified dimension.
    SlantTransform
    Vertically slants (shears) an image by a given angle and applies an x-translation to compensate for the change in position implied by the slant (allows the vertical center-line to remain constant, if desired).
